com.adyen.core.models

Class PaymentMethod

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.adyen.core.models.PaymentMethod
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public final class PaymentMethod
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    The class that contains detailed payment method information.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  PaymentMethod.Card
      Contains the saved details about a credit card used in the past.
      static class  PaymentMethod.Configuration
      The merchant configuration saved with the payment method.
      static class  PaymentMethod.Type
      Constants for several popular payment methods.

    • Method Detail

      • getInputDetails

        public java.util.Collection<InputDetail> getInputDetails()

      • getPaymentModule

        public PaymentModule getPaymentModule()
        Returns a payment module for the selected payment method. If the selected payment method does not require a module, this method returns null.
        Returns:
        the payment module if the selected method requires a module, otherwise null.

      • getSavedCard

        public PaymentMethod.Card getSavedCard()
        Get the saved card details in case this is a recurring payment method.
        Returns:
        The saved card. This is null if this payment method is not recurring or a card.

      • getType

        public java.lang.String getType()
        Get the type of the payment method.
        Returns:
        The type in a string format.

      • getName

        public java.lang.String getName()
        Get the name of the payment method.
        Returns:
        The name in a string format.

      • getPaymentMethodData

        public java.lang.String getPaymentMethodData()

      • getLogoUrl

        public java.lang.String getLogoUrl()
        Get the URL of the payment method's logo.
        Returns:
        The logo URL.

      • getMemberPaymentMethods

        public java.util.List<PaymentMethod> getMemberPaymentMethods()
        Get the member of this PaymentMethod. For example, for "card" the members can be the specific card types (e.g. "visa", "maestro", ...).
        Returns:
        The list with member payment methods. Can be null if no member payment methods exist.

      • isRedirectMethod

        public boolean isRedirectMethod()
        The method to determine if a redirect is required for this payment method.
        Returns:
        True if a redirect is required, otherwise false

      • isOneClick

        public boolean isOneClick()
        Check wether this is a recurring (oneClick) PaymentMethod.
        Returns:
        true iff this is a recurring (oneClick) PaymentMethod.

      • getConfiguration

        public PaymentMethod.Configuration getConfiguration()
        Get the merchant configuration if it was provided with the payment method.
        Returns:
        The merchant configuration, can be null.
